projects.title: Apex Security
projects.descriptionTitleOne: A shield for your online assets since 2021!
projects.descriptionOne: Although Apex Sec is a fictional business, we are still rated as the #1 company in the world to protect against online cyber attacks and data loss.
projects.descriptionTitleTwo: A cool layout means great service, right?
projects.descriptionTwo: Our is just meant to catch your eyes and pull you in. As we all know, if the website looks good, then the company must provide exceptional service. Take a look for yourself!

projects.title: simple todo
projects.descriptionOne: With a simple ui and no need to create an account or login, this application is built to allow a quick and easy way of creating any sorts of list for what you need

projects.title: Pomodoro Timer
projects.descriptionTitleOne: Time is free, but it's priceless
projects.descriptionOne: Managing your time can be a stressful task. It can be difficult to know when you might need a rest, or when you really need to buckle down and get s!#t done!
projects.descriptionTwo: With a simple ui and easy to understand timeline, this pomodoro application is a suitable tool for anyone trying to manage or accomplish an effective workflow and time use

projects.title: Restaurant Reservations
projects.descriptionOne: With an easy to use layout and labeled containers, it makes creating, updating, and cancelling reservations easier than ever. Making organization simple and fast
projects.descriptionTwo: With a couple easy clicks you can specify the amount of persons in your party, time of arrival, and where you would like to be seated. Fast, easy,simple.
